boat.full_description: These boats make great tenders or as trailer sailers. The type is very well known on the east coast as being sturdy , stable and a good performance. The hulls are proffessionally moulded with a heavy gel coat  applied. Four layers of GRP make the mould in stiff and strong. Ready for home completion. All details and dimensions available.
boat.name: Oyster Lugger
boat.short_description: 12ft Oyster Lugger based on the small working dinghys used on the Essex and Suffolk rivers at the ten of the century.
